title: U.S. opinion poll : sexiest musical instrument 2014
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis representing Response, and a y axis representing Share of respondents.
The highest category is found at Guitar where Share of respondents is 26.0.
The lowest category is found at Flute where Share of respondents is 5.0.
gold: This statistic reveals the sexiest musical instrument according to adults in the United States in 2014 . During a survey , 26 percent of adults found the guitar to be the sexiest musical instrument to play .
